body.name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker, IPX7 Waterproof Wireless Speaker with Colorful Flashing Lights, 25W Super Bass 24H Playtime, 100ft Range, TWS Pairing for Outdoor, Home, Party, Beach, Travel
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 2 hrs 45 mins
Or fastest pickup Tuesday, February 13. Order within 2 hrs 45 mins
features: [Loud Stereo Sound & Dual Pairing] Deliver surprisingly loud and well-balanced sound with virtually no distortion through 2 drivers and our proprietary technology. Enjoy up to 25W room-filling sound with punchy bass, strong midranges, and crisp highs. Pair 2 speakers together via Bluetooth to play the same music in perfect sync, double the volume, and create an immersive stereo sound experience. It is your perfect partner for playing games, listening to music and watching movies.

[IPX7 Waterproof & Rugged Design] Being IPX7 waterproof, this wireless Bluetooth speaker is protected against rain, spills, and splashes and can even survive submersion in up to 3.3 feet of water for up to 30 minutes. Engineered to with stand bumps and drops, the outdoor speaker in a rounded triangular prism shape is more durable than others and compact enough to hold. Perfect for using in house parties or taking to pool parties, beach parties, barbecues, biking, hiking, camping, etc.

[Bluetooth 5.3 & Up to 24 Hours Playtime] Bluetooth 5.3 provides incredible wireless Bluetooth range of up to 100 feet from your device. And this portable wireless Bluetooth party speaker lasts all day long with up to 24 hours of playtime per charge. You can turn on/off the multi-color lights & two hidden speaker lights by click the "Light Button" on the surface to suit your needs and extend the battery life. The actual playtime varies by volume level, audio content, and use.

[EQ Pulsing Colorful Light Show] Get the party started with crisp and clear sound and rock the party with multi-color flashing lights. A short press of the "Light Button" to enable the flashing colorful LED lights and livens up your party. The multi-color LED lights and two hidden speaker lights will sync to the beat of the music to create a pulsing light show.

[What You Get] 1 waterproof Bluetooth speaker,1 Type-C charging cable, 1 quick start guide, and lifetime technical support. The built-in microphone lets you handle phone calls handsfree without reaching for your phone. You can also stream music via the AUX jack. Crystal clear music and colorful flashing lights make these Bluetooth speakers with lights great gifts for men and women, girls and boys.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Compact & Portable The portable Bluetooth speaker with lights and extra sound effects delivers up to 25W loud and clear sound, yet is compact enough to fit comfortably in your hand or slip into your bag or backpack. If this IPX7 waterproof Bluetooth speaker drops into the water by accident, it can float to the surface. Perfect for taking it to the beach, bathroom, pool party, or using it on the go. 25W Loud Stereo Sound 2 drivers pump out up to 25W loud room-filling sound and well-balanced sound—crisp highs, strong midranges, and punchy bass. The TWS feature allows you to pair 2 BEAT BOOM Bluetooth speakers wirelessly to double the volume and enhance clarity. Let you easily get double loud sound as well as double happiness. It is your perfect partner for playing games, listening to music and watching movies. EQ Light Switch A short press of the "Light Button" to turn on/off the speaker lights or RGB lights. Enable the flashing colorful LED lights and livens up the party. The LED lights around the body will sync to the beats of the music, creating a dynamic light show that cycles through 7 colors. The two hidden speaker lights will also sync to the beat of the music, taking the party atmosphere up a notch.

Durable & Premium Battery Equipped with a premium large capacity Li-ion battery, using the same battery technology that is used to power high-performance electric vehicles, it is engineered to keep the party going all night and builtto last. It also ensures more stable performance. Which makes this Bluetooth speaker battery reach the extreme in terms of battery life. Help you enjoy a grand auditory feast. 24-Hour Playtime This wireless Bluetooth speaker lets you enjoy distortion-free 360° room-filling sound for up to 24 hours on a single charge. You can disable the multi-color lights and the tapping feature to suit your needs and extend the battery life. Affected by the playback environment and various special occasions. The actual playtime will vary by volume level, audio content, and use. Bluetooth 5.3 Connection With the latest Bluetooth 5.3 technology, it will quickly connect to Bluetooth-enabled devices up to 66 feet away. The TWS (True Wireless Stereo) technology allows you to pair 2 Bluetooth speakers with light show together via Bluetooth to create left and right channels for 50W true stereo sound. Stream crisp, synchronized music in perfect sync so everyone can dance to the same beat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome speaker (with a small warning)
reviews.reviewText: This is a fantastic little speaker. It sounds great, the battery life is long, and it's durable. It is definitely a great little speaker for the price and looks awesome with flashing party lights. My warning: be careful on the speaker placement. I decided to put it on the ledge above my shower so I could listen to music; the bass is so strong that it vibrated the speaker of the ledge and landed on my foot, which taught me two things: 1. it's a little heavy (I now have a bruise on my foot) but it didn't get damaged at all so it is tough, & 2. it's waterproof so it didn't get ruined at all! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality and price
reviews.reviewText: Surprisingly,this speaker works really good for the price! Nice and clear,loud bass,just what I need. The lights are pretty cool. You can have both sets of lights on,or just one on,or both off. Deff wasn't expecting it to work as well as it does for such a low price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy Two and Link To Get Stereoooooo!
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these speakers in black. They can easily be linked together to produce the stereo effect. The sound quality is very nice. The bass response is sufficient. They are USB-C rechargeable and have excellent battery life. The LED light show, which pulses to the beat of the music, can easily be turned off. The speakers are waterproof so they don’t mind sitting on the windowsill during steamy showers. They easily paired to my iPhone and play my streaming music service. I really enjoy these speakers. I recommend buying two if you can.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice product but powerful bright disco lights
reviews.reviewText: I like this portable Bluetooth speaker it’s a nice quality . I use it in my 18 wheeler to listen to podcasts . My only regret is the psychedelic lights . They’re pretty , but distracting . It’s a lovely speaker , volume is perfect for a loud bouncy truck . This would be a great gift for a teen but the lights are very disco like and hard to hear at night. Pretty and works good though

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for a small room
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a small reading room and it sounds great! The battery last a long time and the lights are nice but you can turn them off if you like. Worth the money for this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My second attempt at a good waterproof speaker.
reviews.reviewText: This is my second attempt at buying a waterproof Bluetooth speaker to use in my bathroom and when I wash my car. I got it in September of 2023 and have used it for at least 10 minutes every day, sometimes for much longer. I’ve only charged it once when I first got it. The battery life is amazing. The sound quality is unlike anything I expected at this price point. And it’s loud enough to use outside over the street noise when cleaning my car. Not quite loud enough to hear over the vacuum cleaner unless actually in the car while I do it. Definitely worth buying if you want a loud reliable speaker that also will hold up to exposer to water

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars How is this not $100?
reviews.reviewText: Hands down this is the best "cheap" bluetooth speaker I've ever had. The sound quality and battery life is that if a high end speaker. This plays all day at work without dying and the sound quality is excellent. I wish I would have known about this speaker years ago so I could have saved money on several other speakers that are junk compared to this one. It even FEELS expensive. GET THIS SPEAKER you will not regret it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little speaker that could
reviews.reviewText: This is a great Bluetooth speaker. This is my second one and not because the first stopped working. I accidentally melted chocolate on the first one (long story). The sound is great, especially while showering because of the small space acoustis. The lighting is fun and allows this little speaker to be the life of the party. Oh, and waterproof? I spent quite a bit of time trying to scrub the chocolate out and listened to the speaker while scrubbing it. I recommend this little sound machine for a myriad of occasions.
